interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Ombre Burgundy Prelooped Bomb Twist Crochet Hair Prelooped Crochet Braids 18 Inch
Review Date: 2020/11/05
Store: UHair
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'UHair', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Sew-In', 'Package Dimensions': '12.95 x 9.41 x 3.19 inches; 2.09 Pounds'}
Review Text: I loved the length of this hair. The ombré color was perfect . It came with six packs which was enough for my whole head. The hair was pretty good. My only dislike is that the styles only last for two weeks because the hair unravels. The price point is pretty good for six packs of hair.
Review Title: Ombré burgundy pre looped hair
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
BJÖRN HALL Nurse Headband with Buttons for Face Mask | Elastic Swimsuit Material, Smooth & Stretchy | Ear Saver Headband with Buttons | Perfect for Nurses, Doctors & Medical Students
Björn Hall
{'Package Dimensions': '5.4 x 4.9 x 0.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
Love that the bjorn hall band came in black. It’s versatile to match my work uniforms . Made of very high quality material. The only thing I wasn’t crazy about was my buttons not seeming symmetrical. Other than that this head band will last a very long time.5 stars for me.
Bjorn hall headband
8inch Short Afro Puff Synthetic Hair Bun Chignon Hairpiece For Women Drawstring Ponytail Kinky Curly Updo Clip Hair Extensions(1B#)
BURHAIR

I loved this synthetic Afro puff for a number of resins , like color, puff factor, the drawstring, the fullness of the puff. The clips inside and drawstring helps the ponytail stay. It looked so realistic. The price was very low for such a good product.
8inch Afro puff
Rhinestone Crystal Padded Headband Bejewled Statement Wide Hairband Charm Bridal Wedding Party Headwear Hair Hoop Hair Accessorie (gold)
JERTOCLE
{'Color': 'Gold', 'Material': 'Pearl, Crystal Rhinestone, Cloth, Rhinestone, Crystal', 'Fabric Type': 'Velvet', 'Brand': 'JERTOCLE', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Package Dimensions': '6.93 x 6.69 x 2.36 inches; 4.16 Ounces'}
[[VIDEOID:5c8e3999465f4761272a9d07dea2b960]] This head band is very sparkly. It’s so cute. Nice and thick. It’s made well. I wore it a few times . The only downside is that some of the Rinestones came off . I calmly just Re glued them back in.  I would wear this with dressy clothes. I think pricing was neutral for this product.
Rinestone crystal padded head band
Ambari Black Crowns for Women Tiara Vintage Style Crown Hair Piece Accessories for Bride, Wedding, Prom, Birthday, Engagement, Bridal Shower - Baroque Jewelry for Women, New Packaging
ambari
{'Product Dimensions': '4.53 x 4.53 x 2.36 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '645312483587'}
This crown was elegant in its own right. The crown itself wasn’t that thick. But in the jewel part of the crown it has thickness. Warmth from the crown was low. I feel like the quality of this crown is awesome. The color is nice and dark. I live the mysterious look of the crown. The price point was good. I recommend this.
Ambari black crown
Ombre Bomb Twist Crochet Hair Burgundy Pre Looped Crochet Braids 14 Inch
JulyQueen
{'Brand': 'JulyQueen', 'Extension Length': '14 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Package Dimensions': '3 x 2 x 1 inches; 2.56 Ounces'}
The bomb crotchet twist came with 6 packages of hair . Each pack had the right amount of thickness. The ombré color was perfect , and vibrant . The ends of the hair the color was very visible.. the color I had was the burgundy ombré hair. It is enough packs to install a whol head.  Another bang for your buck item.
Ombré bomb twist crotchet hair

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Profession**: Likely in the medical field (indicated by the use of a nurse headband).
- **Color Preference**: Favors versatile colors that complement work uniforms, particularly attracted to vibrant shades like burgundy, which is now emphasized as a favorite for hair accessories.
- **Material Quality**: Highly values high-quality, natural materials; appreciates smooth and durable textures, including wavy styles that provide both aesthetic appeal and comfort.
- **Functionality**: Emphasizes practical features in accessories, preferring easy-to-use items like headbands and braids that can be seamlessly integrated into daily routines.
- **Attention to Detail**: Notices design elements such as color vibrancy and style, favoring well-finished products that are both visually striking and functional.
- **Fashion Versatility**: Seeks items that transition effortlessly from casual to dressy, with a strong interest in stylish hair products that enhance professional and formal attire.
- **Overall Satisfaction**: Generally a positive reviewer, often giving high ratings based on quality, usability, and aesthetic appeal. Adapts easily to minor issues via adjustments.
- **New Insights**: Recently showcased a deeper appreciation for unique, elegant accessories that maintain versatility, particularly in vibrant colors, contributing to an enhanced personal style. This includes an affinity for hair products that have aesthetic benefits while ensuring usability.
